Mongo, nke akpọkwara Nkundo ma ọ bụ Mongo-Nkundu (Lomongo, Lonkundu), bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ọtụtụ ndị Mongo na-asụ na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ndị na-asụ Mongo bi n'etiti DR Congo n'elu nnukwu mpaghara dị n'ime usoro nke Osimiri Congo
Maho (2009) depụtara otu n'ime ndị a, Bafoto (Batswa de l'Equateur), C.611, dị ka asụsụ dị iche
